characters.name: Wadsworth
characters.description: a traditional English butler; the driving force of the play. Formal, quick-witted and very much trying to keep control of the unravelling proceedings.

characters.name: Yvette
characters.description: the maid; loyal to Wadsworth and possible in over her head with this party.

characters.name: Miss Scarlet
characters.description: a madam; a dry, sardonic businesswoman whose business is about finding out about yours.

characters.name: Mrs Peacock
characters.description: the politician's wife; batty, neurotic and quick to hysteria.

characters.name: Mrs White
characters.description: the frequent widow; surrounded by tragedy but how much of it did she cause?

characters.name: Colonel Mustard
characters.description: the military man; a puffy, pompous, dense blowhard who - if bullets were knowledge - would be down to his last shot.

characters.name: Professor Plum
characters.description: the academic; somewhat arrogant and easily impressed with himself but why is he no longer working in medicine?

characters.name: Mr Green
characters.description: the bureaucrat; timid, accident-prone and very anxious - what is his secret?
Ensemble (most only in one scene so doubling up most likely and being able to play dead is a bonus!)

characters.name: The Motorist
characters.description: what a time to break down!
